title: Projects
preamble:
Throughout my coding journey, I've invested time in diverse personal projects, honing my skills across web applications, APIs, and more. These projects showcase my adaptability in various facets of software development.
Driven by a passion for innovation, these endeavors underscore my commitment to staying ahead in tech trends and continually expanding my skill set.
Explore the detailed portfolio of these projects to witness the outcomes of my efforts.

projects.title: The Biergarten App
projects.metaDescription: The Biergarten App is an app for beer lovers to share their favourite brews and breweries with like-minded people online.
projects.text:
The Biergarten App is an app for beer lovers to share their favourite brews and breweries with like-minded people online.
Built with Next.js, Tailwind, Node.js, and PostgreSQL, this project is a full-stack web application that allows users to create accounts, post reviews, and interact with other users.

projects.title: SpoonBot
projects.metaDescription: A web application powered by OpenAI's GPT-3 API showcasing its ability to generate restaurant names, detailed restaurant reviews, and enticing restaurant menus.
projects.text:
SpoonBot is a web application powered by OpenAI's GPT-3 API, showcasing its ability to generate restaurant names, detailed restaurant reviews, and enticing restaurant menus based on a user's input.
This project is built with Next.js, Tailwind, and Node.js, and it demonstrates the potential of AI for generating human-like content.

projects.title: DoggoBot
projects.metaDescription: A Discord bot that uses the DogCEO api to send pictures of dogs.
projects.text:
The DoggoBot is a Discord bot built in TypeScript using the discord.js library. Its main functionality is to periodically send pictures of dogs to designated channels on Discord servers. 
This project is built with Node.js and showcases the potential of Discord bots for automating tasks and providing entertainment.
